features.featureTitle: Remove the orange/gold button-style background that appears behind the header logo/brand lockup by overriding the global button background styles for the logo button only (the element with class `header-brand-btn` in `frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx`). The header background and the logo/brand position/size behavior (including the scroll-compress behavior) must remain unchanged, and other header buttons (Cart/Dashboard/Admin/Login/Logout) must keep their existing styling.
